header.title: Making a document editable with the HTML Form Editor

s1.title: Making a document editable with the HTML Form Editor
s1.p:
There are two things todo:
Create a descriptor file:
In the case of the publication "Materials Science" the descriptor files are located at stylesheets/wyona/cms/edit/editdescriptor/
Set the link within the menu:
In the case of the publication "Materials Science" the menu files are located at docs/ethz/mat/menu/
